SELECT top ${size} id, unit_code as unitCode, water_meter_code as waterMeterCode, responsibility_code as responsibilityCode, unit_name as unitName, industryName as industryName, unit_address as unitAddress, areaCountryName, contacts as contacts, mobile_number as mobile_number, phone_number as phone_number FROM ( SELECT row_number ( ) over ( ORDER BY a.create_time desc
,a.unit_code ${unitCodeRank}
) AS rownumber, a.id,
a.unit_code,
STUFF(( SELECT ',' + water_meter_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_meter WHERE use_water_unit_id=a.id and node_code=#{nodeCode} FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '' ) as water_meter_code,
a.responsibility_code,
a.unit_name,
(select industry_name from t_w_quota_info as c where c.deleted='0' and a.industry=c.id and c.node_code=#{nodeCode}) as industryName,
a.unit_address,
(select dict_item_name from t_dict_item where dict_id in(select id from t_dict where dict_code=#{dictCode} and node_code=#{nodeCode}) and dict_item_code=a.area_country and node_code=#{nodeCode}) as areaCountryName,
b.contacts,
b.mobile_number,
b.phone_number FROM t_w_use_water_unit as a
left join ( select use_water_unit_id,contacts,mobile_number,phone_number from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where deleted='0' and node_code=#{nodeCode} and main='1' ) as b on a.id =b.use_water_unit_id WHERE a.unit_code_type in (select unit_type_code as unit_code_type from t_w_use_water_unit_role where person_id=#{userId}) and a.deleted='0' and a.node_code=#{nodeCode}
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_meter where water_meter_code like '%${waterMeterCode}%' )
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where mobile_number like '%${mobileNumber}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_Id as id from t_w_bank where bank_account like '%${bankAccount}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_Id as id from t_w_bank where signed =#{signed} and deleted='0')
and a.abnormal =#{abnormal}
and a.unit_code like '%${unitCode}%'
and a.unit_name like '%${unitName}%'
and a.unit_code_type like '%${unitCodeType}%'
and a.responsibility_code like '%${responsibilityCode}%'
) temp_row WHERE rownumber > ( ( #{current}- 1 ) * #{size} );

left join ( select use_water_unit_id,contacts,mobile_number,phone_number from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where deleted='0' and node_code=#{nodeCode} and main='1' ) as b on a.id =b.use_water_unit_id WHERE a.unit_code_type in (select unit_type_code as unit_code_type from t_w_use_water_unit_role where person_id=#{userId}) and a.deleted='0' and a.node_code=#{nodeCode}
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_meter where water_meter_code like '%${waterMeterCode}%' )
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_id as id from t_w_use_water_unit_contacts where mobile_number like '%${mobileNumber}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_Id as id from t_w_bank where bank_account like '%${bankAccount}%' and deleted='0')
and a.id in (select use_water_unit_Id as id from t_w_bank where signed =#{signed} and deleted='0')
and a.abnormal =#{abnormal}
and a.unit_code like '%${unitCode}%'

select id, node_code , unit_code , unit_name , unit_address , industry , zip_name , zip_address , invoice_unit_name , save_unit_type , gisX , gisY , imain , department , area_country , (select dict_item_name from t_dict_item where dict_id in(select id from t_dict where dict_code=#{dictCode} and node_code=#{nodeCode}) and dict_item_code=area_country and node_code=#{nodeCode}) as areaCountryName, abnormal , abnormal_cause from t_w_use_water_unit where id=#{id} and node_code=#{nodeCode}

SELECT id, use_water_unit_id, use_year, water_meter_code, now_price, node_code, is_warning, caliber, sector, ( january_count + february_count + march_count + april_count + may_count + june_count + july_count + august_count + september_count + october_count + october_count + november_count + december_count ) AS waterNumber FROM t_w_water_month_use_data WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} AND use_water_unit_id = #{id} AND use_year = DateName(YEAR,GetDate()) ORDER BY waterNumber DESC;

SELECT a.*, (select industry_name as subIndustryName from t_w_quota_info where id=a.sub_industry)as subIndustryName, (select industry_name as productName from t_w_quota_info where id=a.product) as productName FROM t_w_use_water_quota as a WHERE use_water_unit_id = #{id} and node_code=#{nodeCode} ORDER BY create_time desc

select b.agreement_number as agreementNumber, sBankName = '建行一行', sBankNum = '105651002108', sUnitName = '成都市节约用水监管事务中心', sBankAccount = '51001416108050735062', b.bank_of_deposit as bankOfDeposit, b.people_bank_pay_sys_number as peopleBankPaySysNumber, b.bank_code as bankCode, CASE b.entrust_unit_name WHEN '' THEN a.unit_name WHEN NULL THEN a.unit_name ELSE b.entrust_unit_name END AS accountUnitName, b.bank_account as bankAccount from (select id, unit_name from t_w_use_water_unit where deleted='0' and node_code=#{nodeCode}) as a inner join (select use_water_unit_Id, agreement_number, bank_of_deposit, people_bank_pay_sys_number, bank_code,entrust_unit_name, bank_account from t_w_bank where deleted='0' and signed='0' and bank_account is not null and bank_account !='' ) as b on a.id =b.use_water_unit_Id
